1.title: Yoga for Flexibility
1.plot: Increase your range of motion through breathing and proper body alignment. Musicle tone and energy flow will increase as tension flows away.

2.title: Relaxation and Rejuvenation
2.plot: Reduce large and small stresses of everyday life. Help eliminate headaches and lessen tensions in seconds with quick relaxation techniques.

3.title: Yoga for Strength
3.plot: Build strength not with weights or machines but by unlocking the power deep inside your body. Challenge muscles while relaxing your mind. Improve posture and firm your midsection.

imdb.plot outline: Fitness trainer Linda Arkin offers a beginners guide to the benefits of yoga in this instructional video that guides novices through a yoga-based workout in which she introduces many of the basic stretching movements and postures of the discipline and shares how they can help you achieve a stronger body as well as a satisfied mind.
imdb.title: Yoga with Linda Arkin
plot: Fitness trainer Linda Arkin offers a beginners guide to the benefits of yoga in this instructional video that guides novices through a yoga-based workout in which she introduces many of the basic stretching movements and postures of the discipline and shares how they can help you achieve a stronger body as well as a satisfied mind.
